          Gopali Youth Welfare Society is one of the largest student-run NGOs registered under the Government of India managed by students and professors of IIT Kharagpur.1. Led 5 social initiatives of the organization along with other governing bodies and to facilitate operations of 120+ members across 10+ teams.2. Looked after all the financial matters of the organization.3. Worked on the project of a hostel facility for 100 students for providing improved access to  education to deprived children.4. Guided the Skill Development team.

volunteer_experience.info: 1. Managed a team of 20+ students and a fund of around INR 50 Lakhs as a Finance Head for the smooth functioning of the organization.2.
